title: Bug 120315: Display property not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is not being applied in the new PDF emitter.
OB: The display property set to 'none' does not hide the item when generating a PDF using the new emitter.
EB: The display property set to 'none' should hide the item when generating a PDF using the new emitter.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'properties' view for the label.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Generate a PDF using the new emitter.
5. Verify that the label is hidden in the generated PDF.
